Package index

All functions

bln_add_management()
Estimate default values for management
bln_b_diseaseresistance()
Calculate indicator for soil resistance for soil based diseases
bln_b_pmn()
Calculate and evaluate the index for the microbial biological activity in the Netherlands
bln_bbwp_bw()
Function to calculate and evaluate the water buffering capacity of soils in view of water retention in soil
bln_bbwp_ngw()
Function to calculate and evaluate the N buffering capacity of soils in view of water purification for groundwater quality
bln_bbwp_nsw()
Function to calculate and evaluate the N buffering capacity of soils in view of water purification for surface quality
bln_bbwp_psw()
Function to calculate and evaluate the P buffering capacity of soils in view of water purification for surface quality
bln_c_cec()
Calculate and evaluate the soil fertility based on the CEC
bln_c_magnesium()
Calculate the capacity of soils to supply Magnesium for the BLN production function
bln_c_nitrogen()
Calculate the soil nitrogen supplying capacity in the Netherlands
bln_c_ph()
Calculate the distance for target for soil pH in view of the BLN production function
bln_c_posphor()
Calculate the phosphate availability index in the Netherlands
bln_c_potassium()
Calculate the K availability index for the Netherlands
bln_c_sulfur()
Calculate the capacity of soils to supply sulfur for the BLN production function
bln_calc_psp()
Calculate the precipitation surplus
bln_clim_cbalance()
Function to calculate and evaluate a default SOM balance
bln_clim_csat()
Function to evaluate the carbon saturation via max C saturation potential estimated via ML modelling
bln_clim_rothc()
Function to evaluate the carbon saturation via RothC simulation
bln_clim_somers()
Function to evaluate the carbon saturation via SOMERS simulation on peat soils
bln_crops
Linking table between crops and different functions in OBIC
bln_evaluate_logistic()
Evaluate a soil quality function using the general logistic function
bln_evaluate_logistic_gaus_down()
Evaluate logistically initially and gausian eventually
bln_evaluate_parabolic()
Evaluate a soil quality function using a parabolic function
bln_farm_hf
An example dataset with all BLN input prepared for de Marke farm
bln_field()
Calculate the BLN score for one field
bln_field_dt()
Calculate the BLN score for one field using a data.table as input
bln_field_optimiser()
Optimize the crop rotation plan for soil quality improvement
bln_format_aer()
Convert possible B_AER_CBS values to standardized values
bln_format_gtclass()
Determine groundwater table class based on highest and lowest mean groundwater levels
bln_input_description
A dataset with all input variables required by the BLN package
bln_lsw
Local Surface Water properties needed for BBWP functions
bln_lsw_farm_hf
An example dataset with all LSW properties related to the fields of the Marke farm
bln_makkink
Makkink correction factor table
bln_nut_nitrogen()
Function to calculate and evaluate the nitrogen use efficiency in view of the soils' function to improve nutrient recycling
bln_nut_nue()
Function to calculate and evaluate the NUE
bln_nut_phosphorus()
Function to calculate and evaluate the phosphorus use efficiency in view of the soils' function to improve nutrient recycling
bln_nut_potassium()
Function to calculate and evaluate the potassium use efficiency in view of the soils' function to improve nutrient recycling
bln_output_description
A dataset with all output variables generated by the BLN package
bln_p_aggstability()
Calculate and evaluates the aggregate stability index based on occupation CEC
bln_p_compaction()
Calculate and evaluates the risk for subsoil compaction
bln_p_crumbleability()
Calculate and evaluate the crumbleability in view of the soils production function
bln_p_density()
Calculate the bulk density
bln_p_droughtstress()
Calculate and evaluate the yield depression due to drought in view of the capacity of soils to produce food
bln_p_sealing()
Calculate and evaluate the soil sealing risk
bln_p_waterstress()
Calculate and evaluate the yield depression due to drought or wetness in view of the capacity of soils to produce food
bln_p_wetnessstress()
Calculate and evaluate the yield depression due to wet conditions in view of the capacity of soils to produce food
bln_p_whc()
Calculate indicators for water holding capacity in the topsoil
bln_p_windererosion()
Calculate and evaluate the indicator for wind erodibility in view of food production
bln_p_workability()
Calculate and evaluate the soil health for workability
bln_parms
Table with BLN parameters being used in the package
bln_rothc()
RothC calculation motor
bln_rothc_event()
Combine all EVENT data needed for RothC modelling for the Netherlands
bln_rothc_event_amendment()
Calculate the monthly timing of carbon inputs for different fertilizer strategies for the Netherlands
bln_rothc_event_crop()
Calculate the crop rotation related C inputs of a field on monthly basis for the Netherlands
bln_rothc_field()
Function for simple RothC simulation for grassland and cropland field
bln_rothc_input_amendment()
Do check and expand amendment input table for RothC for the Netherlands
bln_rothc_input_crop()
Do check and expand crop input table for RothC for the Netherlands
bln_rothc_input_rmf()
Estimate the rate modifying factors for the RothC modelling
bln_rothc_multicore()
Function to evaluate the carbon saturation via RothC simulation on multiple fields using multicore processing
bln_rothc_sim()
Simulate SOC evolution using Roth-C for the Netherlands
bln_scen_croprotation
A dataset with potential crop rotation scenarios per agricultural economic region
bln_soiltype
Table with country specific soil types being used to evaluate soil quality
bln_somers
A dataset with meta-model results from SOMERS per unique base combination peat soil
bln_thresholds
Table with country specific threshold values to evaluate soilquality'
bln_wat_groundwater_recharge()
Function to calculate and evaluate the groundwater recharge in view of the soils' function to retain water
bln_wat_nretention_gw()
Function to calculate and evaluate the N retention in soils in view of water purification for groundwater quality
bln_wat_nretention_sw()
Function to calculate and evaluate the N retention in soils in view of water purification for surface quality
bln_wat_nrisk_gw()
Function to calculate and evaluate the N leaching risks in soils in view of water purification for groundwater quality
bln_wat_nrunoff()
Function to calculate and evaluate the N leaching risk in soils in view of water purification for surface water quality
bln_wat_pesticide()
Function to calculate and evaluate the pesticide retention in soils in view of water purification for groundwater water quality
cf_ind_importance()
Helper function to weight and correct the risk and scores
checkvar()
Select the correct boundary values (min and max) for a given parameter
ind_workability()
Calculate indicator for workability
pF_curve()
Water retention curve
pFpara_class()
Parameter estimation based on class of Staringreeks (Tabel 3, Wosten 2001)
pFpara_ptf_Wosten1999()
Estimate water retention curve parameters based on Wosten 1999
pFpara_ptf_Wosten2001()
Estimate water retention curve parameters based on Wosten 2001
plot_bln_boxplot()
Plot boxplots for BLN indicators and scores for a group of fields
plot_bln_map()
Plot a BLN score or indicator on a map
plot_bln_rothc_ts()
Function to plot simple RothC simulation time series for a single field
rothc_initialise()
Function for initializing the RothC model
rothc_parallel()
function to run RothC parallel for a series of fields
rothc_scenario()
Function to prepare inputs for various scenarios with RothC
wf()
Helper function to weight and correct the risk and scores
